title: Item
description: Items are entities which contain an actual HTTP request, and sample responses attached to it.

id.description: A unique ID that is used to identify collections internally

name.description: A human readable identifier for the current item.

protocolProfileBehavior.title: Protocol Profile Behavior
protocolProfileBehavior.description: Set of configurations used to alter the usual behavior of sending the request

disableBodyPruning.description: Disable body pruning for GET, COPY, HEAD, PURGE and UNLOCK request methods.
